entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
